Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory749.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg', 3: '0.2', 4: '0.2', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Standing in the sea of gold is the love of Max's life."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Max', 3: 'A-are you here to take me with you now...? I...', 4: '2'}
{3: "If this is where his life should come to an end... he is certainly happy that this is how it's going to end."}
{3: "With a smile that's still more radiant than the gold of the wheat fields, the girl opens her mouth to speak."}
{3: "Max isn't quite sure what just happened, but he thinks he just saw Oakley—whom he's seen countless times in his dreams—flip the bird at him."}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Oakley, why are you...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Oakley', 3: "Get yourself together already. Remember what I said? Death takes everything away from you, and I'm nothing but part of your dream.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "R-right... Oakley is dead... and she's not coming back...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Oakley', 3: "But look at you... you're still alive, no?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Oakley puts her hand over Max's chest. She can feel his heartbeat."}
{2: 'Oakley', 3: "Well, I sure hope I didn't fall in love with a wimp.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Max reaches out for her hand, he feels nothing but his own heartbeat.'}
{2: 'Oakley', 3: 'Get going already. Your son and those young people are still fighting!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "You're right... Guess it isn't time for our paths to cross again just yet.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Oakley', 3: "Well, I'm afraid that's what's going to happen soon if you don't quit smoking.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Max nods at Oakley with a smile. Then, he turns around, with his back facing the sea of wheat fields.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Haha... well, I suppose I'll stick around just a while longer to help them out, then.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Oakley stops talking, only silently leaning on Max's back, her figure gradually fading away."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg', 3: '0.3', 4: '0', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{3: 'As his eyes fly open, Max coughs out the blood foam from his throat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, are you with me?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "Jesus, keep it down, will ya... I'm hurt in the shoulder... not the ear...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Max can hear hurried footsteps as Fann dashes over this way, having noticed that his father has regained consciousness.'}
{3: "Fann drops the pistol to hold Max's hand. This is probably the first time Fann has been this close to Max since Oakley passed."}
{3: 'Unable to get himself in edgewise, Noctis shows a wry smile, knowing that Max will be fine.'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Stop crying already... You look as ugly as your mom when she cried.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Max struggles to his feet with Fann's support, then turns to face Noctis."}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Thank you so much, Noctis...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Don't mention it. See, it's my partner who sent me here to your rescue, saying that the town would be in deep trouble if they got you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: "All while things look as dire as they do? I'm impressed...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Right... except my partner is in an equally dire situation now, too, as we speak...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Max', 3: 'Mind if we have a few words?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a nod, Noctis pulls out the terminal. The connection is established, but Noctis gets no response no matter what he says.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, partner... you still there?!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'With every passing second, Noctis grows more anxious.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey... how are you feeling?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Noctis' worry quickly dissipates when he hears a familiar voice coming from the other side of the line. A split second after, however..."}
{3: '...The line is filled with an anguished scream.'}
